name: Fly Wings - The Ultimate Free Fly Bird
name_original: Fly Wings - The Ultimate Free Fly Bird
description:
***************The ever-best FLAPPY FLY Show on the App Store!!***************

Tap to flap and fly the maximum distance you can. Enjoy the freedom to fly with improved, never seen before designs.

A game which is full of energetic designs and better user controls.
Start playing and see how far can you go?

Features:
◉ Superior user controls.

◉ More themes to unlock and play.

◉ Tap to control your fly wings.

◉ Flawless designs.

◉ Collect more gems and make the journey endless.

◉ Compete with friends & families through Game Center.

Note: This game is free to download, but contains In-App Purchase.
